projectGridLines.title: Tamilnadu Housing Board Project, Nerkundram

Title: Tamilnadu Housing Board Project, Nerkundram

Description: Construction of 228 HIG (B+S+19 Floors in 2 Blocks) Multistoried Residential Flats at Nerkundram Phase â€“ II Stage I Scheme, in S.No. 376/2, 378 etc., Nerkundram
